attributes.action: stop the discrimination of social tenants by creating a differential rent between council and housing trusts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if council tenants are recognised as a special case in that the govenment have instructed councils to half the rent increases for 2009 it should follow that housing trust tenants having as difficult a time in this economic climate should also have the rents reduced, if not then let all those considering moving to trusts beware we will be overlooked because we have no say play fair mr brown
